title: Bucknell University
content: Attended Bucknell University as a Computer Science and Engineering major. Graduated as Summa Cum Laude with honor.

title: Research Assistant
content: Researched on various topics including semantic sensor networks, and Internet of Things, under supervision of Dr. Alan Marchiori.

title: CRA Outstanding Undergraduate Researcher Award Runner-up
content: Runner-up for the 2017 Computing Research Association (CRA) Outstanding Undergraduate Researcher Award (Male, Non-PhD-granting institution).

title: Stanford University
content: Started PhD program in Computer Science at Stanford University
